docs.title: New Pages
docs.text:
pip install mkdocs
pip install mkdocs-material 
mkdocs new MyDocs

# choose one
mkdocs serve # This will run the server locally otherwise...
mkdocs build # this will generate the static files under ./site otherwise...
mkdocs gh-deploy # deploy will automatically generate and deploy static site to gh-pages branch
  • be sure to add site to ./.gitignore
  • check deployment status on github.com -> project -> actions -> pages-build-deployment

docs.title: Old site
docs.text: • clone site, make changes/add pages under ./docs, re-run gh-deploy

docs.title: Configuring windows git w/ SSH
docs.text:
• Install ssh-agent in powershell, start service and add keys
Get-Service ssh-agent | Set-Service -StartupType Automatic -PassThru | Start-Service
start-ssh-agent.cmd
ssh-add path/to/ssh/private/key
  • Make sure keys are in ~/.ssh or specify
